radioOn: Your radio has been detected to be on! Reading and Flashing disabled. Turn off your radio and try again.

flashingEscMissmatchFileNameMissing: Failed flashing ESC {{index}} - File name not found in hex file, please check your hex file version!

escSettingsMcuMismatch: Niezgodność MCU, nadpisanie nie jest włączone - przerwano
